description: This is a Java service class named `FundTransferService` which handles fund transfer operations for a financial application. It manages creating transfer entities, invoking a REST client to perform the transfer, updating transaction statuses, and retrieving transfer records with pagination.

classes.name: FundTransferService
classes.description: A Spring service component responsible for managing fund transfer operations, including creating transfer records, calling external banking services, updating transaction statuses, and retrieving transfer history.

methods.name: fundTransfer
methods.description: Performs a fund transfer by creating a transfer entity, calling an external REST client to process the transfer, updating the transfer status, and returning a response with a success message.

methods.name: readAllTransfers
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all fund transfers, converting entities to DTOs.
